title: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: After importing a new image into the layout, the image is not refreshed and the original image remains displayed.
OB: The expected result is that the new imported image is displayed after importing again.
EB: Currently, the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Import a new image into the layout.2. Verify that the original image is not refreshed and the new imported image is not displayed.
